info.description: A Microsoft WebApi2 application. For use by Jeunesse and its Partners, this api has a focus on product and order creation
info.title: Cart-Api v2

get.summary: Gets the tax information for an order.
Use to check if a retail customer has purchased an upgrade to distributor package and can continue to signup.
Retrieves detailed information for a specific order by its primary key.
Retrieves the order type and whether it is an event based on the provided query model.

put.summary: Sets the shipping info on an order.
Updates the shipping address on an order record.
Sets the shipping info on an autoship order.
Used to move the items in the user's cart to an order.

post.summary: Create a new order with basic information
Adds a product to an order.
Adds the Credit Card payment information to an order in process
Used to auto apply main discount config discount if applicable

get.summary: Extract all product brands
Invalidates the local cache

Get remaining product quantities

Returns a list of functions/purposes for available products

Returns a list of ritual products.

Returns a list of best selling products.
Returns a list of top 5 best selling products.
